snippet: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter said on Thursday that he was removing his senior military assistant, Lt. Gen. Ronald F. Lewis, over allegations of misconduct.
abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter announces removal of his senior military assistant Lt Gen Ronald F Lewis due to allegations of misconduct.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter said on Thursday that he was removing his senior military assistant, Lt. Gen. Ronald F. Lewis, over allegations of misconduct.

headline.main: Defense Secretary Dismisses a General on His Staff in a Misconduct Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Defense Secretary Dismisses a General on His Staff in a Misconduct Inquiry

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
